post:
We have launched our OpenVZ  7 based VPS resource Pool and 30% OFF available for limited stock:

**Coupon Codes:

Pool30OFF  - Gives Recurring 30% OFF
UPGRADE - Free upgrade to next Package e.g. if you order Pool 1 you get free upgrade to pool 2 etc..
DOUBLE RAM - Gives you Double RAM
DOUBLE DISK - Gives you Double Disk**

**OVZ Resource Pool 1 - 4GB**
vCPU: 2
RAM: 4 GB
SSD Disk Space: 50 GB
Max VPS: 2
OS: Linux
IPv4: 2
IPv6: /64 per VPS
BANDWIDTH: Unmetered 100Mbps per VPS
TUN/TAP: YES
VNC: YES
FUSE: YES
DOCKER: YES
DDOS Protection: YES
Instant Activation: YES
Location: LA, USA

Regular price is $9.99 but if you use **coupon "Pool30OFF"** you get a recurring price of $7 per month

Order now from - https://my.hosteons.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=62

We have many more OpenVZ VPS Pool packages available at - https://my.hosteons.com/cart.php?gid=14

You can enable Tun/TAP, create/terminate VPS directly from your client area
For FUSE and DOCKER Just submit a support ticket we will enable it for you.

Our other regular VPS Packages and other deals are available at https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/158046/kvm-vps-with-free-direct-admin-control-panel-la-ny-openvz-7-100-mbps-ummetered-raid-10-ssd#latest
